event.apocalypse.full_moon: Death lingers in the air, a bad moon rises
event.apocalypse.thunderstorm: The sky grows dark, a storm is coming
event.apocalypse.acid_rain: The air reeks of sulphur, death pours from the sky
title.bed.apocalypse.full_moon: You may not rest during a full moon
death.attack.apocalypse.acidRain: %1$s was sprinkled to death in the acidic rain
death.attack.apocalypse.acidRain.player: %1$s melted in acid rain whilst trying to escape %2$s
apocalypse.trap_type.apocalypse.equipmen: Breaks the armor of anyone or anything standing nearby
apocalypse.trap_type.apocalypse.ghost_fr: Temporarily immobilizes nearby ghosts, rendering them defenseless
apocalypse.command.argument.difficulty.i: Value can not be less than 0 or exceed the configured difficulty limit
apocalypse.command.argument.max_difficul: Value can not be less than -1 or exceed 100,000. -1 equals no limit
apocalypse.command.difficulty.max_messag: Set max difficulty to %s for %s players
apocalypse.screen.text_field.desc.create: The default max difficulty level for this world/server. Your difficulty will stop increasing when this number is reached.
The default grace period for this world/server. This is the amount of time that must pass before your difficulty starts increasing. A value of 1.0 equals that of a whole minecraft day (normally).
apocalypse.advancements.root.title: The Apocalypse
apocalypse.advancements.root.description: The grace period is over. Stay on your toes!
apocalypse.advancements.toasty.title: Secret Snack
apocalypse.advancements.toasty.descripti: Obtain some Fatherly Toast. Quite toasty... Grumps likes cookies, so maybe..?
apocalypse.advancements.less_grumpy.desc: Tame a Grump with a scrumptious slice of Fatherly Toast!
apocalypse.advancements.lunarium.title: Moon Alloy
apocalypse.advancements.lunarium.descrip: Craft a Lunarium Ingot from a piece of iron and a soul fragment. Neat!
